page.title: 09Work 1 Shobdon and Byton
page.content:
We wanted to find out how many people in our survey worked and if they worked in Shobdon or Byton.
Out of the 78 people we asked {41 worked.
{26 worked in, or just outside,the {area}and most travelled less than a mile to get to work. 15 people travelled less than \ mile 7 people travelled less than 1 mile 3 people travelled less than 2 miles 1 person travelled less than 3 miles
The{15 people}who worked outside the area travelled up to 20 miles to get to work. 7 people travelled up to 5 miles 4 people travelled up to 10 miles 1 person travelled up to 15 miles 3 people travelled up to 20 miles
